content:
Meeting 2022-03-22T17:00:00+01:00 (For people in the US: This meeting might be off by 1 hour due to DST de-sync with EU)

Agenda:

  • Migrate write.rs to a late pass clippy#8518
  • Changelog
  • ...?
T-15min
hey everyone!
Hello!

FYI: clippy#8520 added a new span_lint function called span_lint_and_sugg_for_edges to highlight the edges of the suggestion (for long suggestions). That can be useful for suggestions that only change the edges of the snipped. I'm thinking of implementing a SuggestionStyle for this, but by todo list still has enough items on it to last a few months^^. Just a general info as it might be useful for other lints :)
Whoops sorry
So in clippy#8518 @Alex Macleod rewrites the write.rs lints, so they are no longer pre-expansion passes. The quite big downside is though, that we loose suggestions for those lints
I'm not sure myself if that trade off is worth it.
@Jason Newcomb has left a comment how this suggestion could still be produced with more work.
Do we need to lose the suggestions? Or can we get them back?
Just read that, I've been thinking of something along those lines myself. I believe it would be possible to get the _literal suggestions back
In that case I'd vote for postponing the changes until we reach suggestion parity.

Yeah, I would be ok with losing some of the suggestions. But currently this degrades the quality of the lints too much IMO.

@Alex Macleod Don't take this as critizism of you or your work. I love the work you put into this!
So if you are ok with putting more work in getting some / most of the suggestions back, that would be perfect
Yeah no worries, I'm fine to continue working on it
Thanks!

So the other thing is that we still have to write the changelog for last release. I didn't get to it this time and would like to rather put my time into reviewing my assigned PRs.

So if someone could volunteer writing the changelog this would be great!
Otherwise @triagebot end-meeting

Does anyone have something to bring up?
React with :working_on_it: if you have something to say.
React with :all_good: if you're ready to end the meeting.
I could write the changelog this time, but it might take a day or two
You still have about 2 week ;)
That was a successful meeting! Sorry for being late. Thanks for attending everyone!
